name: git-workflow
description: Git workflow automation with Jira integration and Conventional Commits format

commands.name: feature
commands.description: Create a new feature branch following Git Flow convention

commands.name: release
commands.description: Create a new release branch following Git Flow convention

commands.name: hotfix
commands.description: Create a new hotfix branch following Git Flow convention

commands.name: finish
commands.description: Finish and merge a feature/release/hotfix branch

commands.name: flow-status
commands.description: Show current Git Flow status and active branches
